text: Endosulfan victims and their families celebrate the announcement of a package for them by the Kerala government, in front of the Secretariat in Thiruvananthapuram on Wednesday. The nine-day indefinite sit-in, launched by the Endosulfan Samara Samithi, ended on Wednesday after the State government agreed to most of the samithi’s demands.— Photo:S.Gopakumar
title: Light at the end of the tunnel
